dialogSequence.speaker: Captain Elysia
dialogSequence.text: We've detected an unknown vessel approaching our station.

dialogSequence.speaker: Lieutenant Vex
dialogSequence.text: Scans show unusual energy signatures. Should we raise shields?

dialogSequence.speaker: Captain Elysia
dialogSequence.text: Yes. And hail them on all frequencies.

decisions.prompt: How will you approach the unknown vessel?

options.text: Send peaceful greeting and offer assistance

dialogSequence.speaker: Ambassador Zorn
dialogSequence.text: We thank you for your assistance against the Void Hunters.

dialogSequence.speaker: Captain Elysia
dialogSequence.text: Our peoples have a common enemy. An alliance would benefit us both.

dialogSequence.speaker: Science Officer Talia
dialogSequence.text: Their technology is incredible! The possibilities for collaboration are endless.

battleDialog.start: Ambassador Zorn: The treaty is signed. Our forces are yours to command, Captain.
battleDialog.victory: Captain Elysia: With our combined strength, we will prevail!
